column1: How can I make my work environment safer?
column2:
Em relação às normas de segurança em ambientes industriais, posso te ajudar com as seguintes informações:
How can I make my work environment safer?
The most important thing to do is to make sure that your work environments are safe. If you are working in an environment that is unsafe, you will not be able to perform your job effectively.
If you work in environments that are not safe, it will be very difficult for you to get the job done. You will have to learn how to deal with situations where you do not have the ability to work effectively, such as when you don't have enough money to pay your bills or when
